extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    PHYS350 and (PHYS344 or PHYS343 or CHEM313).
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from PHYS453; PHYS450.

basic.description: Advanced physics laboratory course providing students with experience in a range of experimental techniques and analysis. A selection of experiments are performed from fields including nuclear physics, applied physics, fluid mechanics, solid state physics, low-temperature physics and optics.
basic.subject: PHYS
basic.title: Advanced Physics Laboratory
